# MoneyBadger - Investment Education Platform

## Project Overview
MoneyBadger is a comprehensive investment education website featuring:
- Detailed explanations of different investment types (Renda Fixa, Ações, FIIs, etc.)
- Investment simulator with Brazilian tax calculations (IR)
- News section about investments
- Mobile-responsive design for future app conversion

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React 19 for UI components

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and pages
- Follow responsive-first design principles
- Structure code for easy conversion to mobile app (PWA or React Native)
- Keep components modular and reusable
- All text in Brazilian Portuguese (pt-BR)

## Project Structure
- `/src/app/` - Main pages and layouts
- `/src/app/investimentos/` - Investment types information
- `/src/app/simulador/` - Investment simulator with tax calculator
- `/src/app/noticias/` - Financial news page

## Running the Project
- Development: `npm run dev`
- Build: `npm run build`
- Start: `npm start`
- Access: http://localhost:3000
